name: European Grand Tour
description: A comprehensive 3-week journey through Europe's most iconic cities, experiencing rich history, diverse cultures, and stunning architecture.

name: Southeast Asia Adventure
description: An exciting adventure through Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia, exploring ancient temples, bustling markets, and pristine beaches.

name: Japan Cherry Blossom Tour
description: Experience the magical cherry blossom season in Japan, visiting Tokyo, Kyoto, and Osaka during peak bloom time.

name: Australian Outback Explorer
description: Discover the rugged beauty of Australia's Red Centre, from Uluru to Alice Springs, with unforgettable wildlife encounters.

name: Scandinavian Northern Lights
description: Chase the Northern Lights across Norway, Sweden, and Finland during the optimal viewing season.

name: Morocco Desert Expedition
description: Journey through imperial cities and sleep under the stars in the Sahara Desert in this authentic Moroccan adventure.

name: New Zealand Road Trip
description: Epic road trip across both North and South Islands, experiencing breathtaking landscapes and adventure activities.

name: Costa Rica Eco Adventure
description: Explore Costa Rica's incredible biodiversity, from cloud forests to pristine beaches, with sustainable travel practices.

name: Peru Machu Picchu Trek
description: Trek the ancient Inca Trail to Machu Picchu and explore the cultural treasures of Cusco and the Sacred Valley.

name: Canadian Rocky Mountains
description: Explore the stunning Canadian Rockies, with hiking, wildlife viewing, and pristine mountain lakes in Banff and Jasper.
